item.title: Iranian foreign minister says US talks in Oman a 'good beginning'
item.description: Abbas Aragchi says there will be consultations, after hours of talks end in Muscat, which both sides entered with significantly different positions.

item.title: Amazon shares fall as it joins Big Tech AI spending spree
item.description: Major firms collectively announce $650bn worth of investment in AI this week, rattling investors.

item.title: Fisherman fleeing elephants killed by crocodile in Zambia
item.description: The fisherman ran into a stream near the river after he and two friends encountered a herd of elephants.

item.title: Watch: Ukrainian soldier thought to be dead calls his family
item.description: Nazar Daletskyi's relatives were told he had been killed in 2022, the first year of Russiaâ€™s full-scale invasion.

item.title: More than 30 killed in blast at Pakistan mosque, officials say
item.description: Almost 170 were injured in the explosion, which took place during Friday prayers in the capital Islamabad.
